alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen; Eastern Essex; Eastern Passaic; Eastern Union; Western Bergen; Western Essex; Western Union (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 04 at 6:54PM EST until February 04 at 11:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of northeast New Jersey, southern Connecticut and southeast New York. * WHEN...Until 11 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will continue to gradually fall through the night, with areas of standing water freezing and producing black ice.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Bergen; Eastern Essex; Eastern Passaic; Eastern Union; Western Bergen; Western Essex; Western Union
